title: Date of the contract
explanation: The contract states 'Master Agreement dated as of November 15, 2012', which is the date of the contract.

title: Party A
explanation: The text specifies 'THE BANK OF NOVA SCOTIA ("Party A")'.

title: party_B
explanation: The text specifies 'Halifax Funding LLC ("Party B")'.

title: Specified entity Party A
explanation: The text states: 'Specified Entity' means in relation to Party A: none.

title: Specified entity Party B
explanation: The text states: 'in relation to Party B ... KKR Asset Management LLC (the 'KKR').'.

title: Specified transaction scope
explanation: The definition of 'Specified Transaction' follows the standard ISDA Section 14 language, with no indication of amendments or non-standard changes.

title: Cross default applicable parties
explanation: The text states that the 'Cross Default' provisions will apply to Party A and will apply to Party B, indicating both parties are subject to these provisions.

title: Specified indebtness includes borrowed_money
explanation: The text does not mention 'borrowed money' explicitly, nor does it state that borrowed money is included or excluded from Specified Indebtedness. Therefore, the value cannot be determined from the provided text alone.

title: Specified indebtness excludes deposits
explanation: The text explicitly states that Specified Indebtedness shall not include obligations in respect of deposits received in the ordinary course of Party A's banking business, meaning deposits are excluded.

title: amount for Party A
explanation: No fixed amount is specified for Party A; threshold is defined as a percentage.

title: currency for Party A
explanation: No specific currency is stated; threshold is a percentage of shareholders' equity, which could be in any currency.

title: percentage for Party A
explanation: The text states 'an amount equal to 3% of the total shareholders' equity of Party A'.

title: percentage reference for Party A
explanation: The reference is 'shareholders' equity', matching the enum SHAREHOLDER.

title: amount for Party B
explanation: No fixed amount is specified for Party B; threshold is defined as a percentage.

title: currency for Party B
explanation: No specific currency is stated; threshold is a percentage of Net Asset Value, which could be in any currency.

title: percentage for Party B
explanation: The text states 'an amount equal to 3% of its Net Asset Value' for Party B.

title: percentage reference for Party B
explanation: The reference is 'Net Asset Value', matching the enum NAV.

title: Credit Event Upon Merger  applicable parties
explanation: The text states that the 'Credit Event Upon Merger' provisions will apply to both Party A and Party B.

title: Automatic Early Termination  applicable parties
explanation: The text states that Automatic Early Termination will not apply to Party A and will not apply to Party B, except in a specific circumstance involving a court order, which is an exception rather than the general rule. Therefore, the default is that it does not apply to either party.

title: Termination Currency
explanation: The text explicitly states 'Termination Currency' means United States Dollars, which corresponds to the ISO code USD.

title: Email for notices for Party A
explanation: The text provides physical address, facsimile, and telephone number for Party A, but no email address is mentioned.

title: Email for notices for Party B
explanation: The text provides physical address, facsimile, and telephone number for Party B, but no email address is mentioned.

title: Process agent for party A
explanation: The text states 'Party A appoints as its Process Agent: Not applicable.'

title: Name of process agent for party A
explanation: Process agent is not applicable for Party A, so no name is provided.

title: Address of process agent for party A
explanation: Process agent is not applicable for Party A, so no address is provided.

title: Process agent for party B
explanation: The text states 'Party B appoints as its Process Agent: Halifax Funding LLC is: National Registered Agents, Inc., 160 Greentree Drive, Suite 101, Dover, Delaware 19904.'

title: Name of process agent for party B
explanation: The process agent for Party B is named as 'National Registered Agents, Inc.' in the text.

title: Address of process agent for party B
explanation: The address for Party B's process agent is given as '160 Greentree Drive, Suite 101, Dover, Delaware 19904.'

title: Party A is a Multibranch party
explanation: The text explicitly states 'Party A is a Multibranch Party.'

title: Party A offices
explanation: The text specifies Party A 'shall be acting out of its New York and Toronto Offices.'

title: Party B is a Multibranch party
explanation: The text explicitly states 'Party B is not a Multibranch Party.'

title: Party B offices
explanation: Party B is not a Multibranch Party, so no offices are listed.

title: Party for calculation agent
explanation: The text states 'The Calculation Agent is Party A unless otherwise agreed in a Confirmation in respect to the relevant Transaction.' No alternative is specified in the provided text.

title: Governing Law
explanation: The text explicitly states that the agreement will be governed by the laws of the State of New York.
